thread.section_title: Hotel Le Walt - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Amazing location!
thread.title_full: Amazing location! - Review of Hotel Le Walt, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: George M
title: Amazing location!
text:
The location of this hotel is amazing! it is one street away from Champs de Mars which is the large field area at the end of which is the Eiffel Tower (to be precise about 0.5 miles from the actual Eiffel Tower), the Invalides is the other direction also about 0.5 miles. There is a metro station just to the left of the entrance of the hotel (Ecole Militaire station) as you walk out in addition to multiple restaurants and boulangeries. A grocery store (Carefour) is across the street in case one needs something from there, as well as banks with ATM machines. Rue Cler which is a largely pedestrian only street is also very close and has a whole bunch of places to eat and shop. We walked everywhere since the location was so close to so many places. We initially got a sixth floor room with the Eiffel tower view, but the room felt very small so we switched to an Executive room (same price) without the view but felt much more confortable. The staff of the hotel was super nice and very friendly . If and when I got back to Paris, I definitely would stay there again. (We booked directly through the hotel website which was very easy)
